activate.bodyWithoutPartner: This service will be disabled in {{days}} days. You can still use it as usual until then. If you change your mind, just reactive it.
activate.bodyWithPartner:
You have disabled Feelgood Plus, but you can still use the service until the end of this month. Remember to tell your added partner about this.

If you change your mind, you can re-activate Feelgood Plus now or sign in later.
activate.bodyEndDateLastDay: Today is the last day you can use Feelgood Plus.
activate.bodyWithEndDate: Feelgood Plus will be disabled in {{days}} days. You can use the service until then. Re-activate if you change your mind.

activate.bodyIsPartnerWithoutEndDate: Feelgood Plus will be disabled in {{days}} days. You can use the service until then.

is_closed.body: Feelgood Plus is disabled. You can activate and start using it whenever you like.

disable.title: Feelgood Plus
disable.bodyWithoutPartner: If you disable this service now you can still use for the rest of the month. The same goes for your partner.
disable.bodyWithPartner:
If you disable Feelgood Plus, you will still be able to use the service until the end of the month.

The service will be disabled for your added partner as well.

force_logout.body: Due to inactivity, we've signed you out for security reasons. If you want to continue, please sign in again.

cancelled.title: Sign in cancelled
cancelled.body: Either you cancelled signing in or something went wrong with Mobile BankID.

body.text:
Either your employer has no agreement with Feelgood concerning any service in the app or they haven't informed us you're employed by them.

If your partner can access Feelgood Plus through her or his employer, your partner add you as a partner for you to get access to the service.

unavailable_service.title: Sign in doesn't work
unavailable_service.body: You can't sign in at the moment. We're working on solving this issue. Try again later.

no_connection.title: Unstable internet connection
no_connection.body: Your internet connection is too unstable for signing in. Please try again.

underage.title: You are under {{ageLimit}}
underage.body: You have to be at least {{ageLimit}} years old to use this app.

terms_and_conditions.accept_toggle: I accept the terms of use.
terms_and_conditions.heading: Terms of use

body.text:
This app works as the central place for your personal contacts with Feelgood. The type of contact you have with Feelgood depends on where you work, where your possible partner works, but also on your own choices.

You can sign in to the app if you're a registered user. That means we've received information from your employer or your partner that you have the right to use our app services. 

Some services and functions are activated immediately upon signing in, while others must be activate by yourself. You can deactivate services and functions you activated on your own whenever it suits you.

To be able to sign in, you need to accept our

request_operation.title: Apply for surgery
request_operation.description: We offer orthopaedic surgery at selected specialist clinics.

private_healthcare.title: Your appointments
private_healthcare.description: Book digital health care for you and your family.

request_operation.heading: Apply for surgery
request_operation.body:
We can offer orthopedic surgery within two weeks through our business partner Swedish MedCare. Surgery is performed at selected specialist clinics in Riga, Latvia.

Surgery in Latvia doesn’t cost anything extra compared to surgery in Sweden. However, travel expenses to and from Latvia aren’t covered. You can apply for surgery if you’ve received a referral in Sweden and have been put on the waiting list.

info.heading: About Swedish MedCare
info.body:
Swedish MedCare is primarily owned by Swedish doctors and specialists.

They offer health care services via a network of carefully selected specialist clinics.

private_healthcare_onboarding.heading: Appointment advice
private_healthcare_onboarding.body:
Appointments with general practitioners are held via video chat or text chat. Appointments with physiotherapists, personal trainers and health coaches are held via video chat.

General practitioners are available 24 hours a day. Other appointments must be made on weekdays between 8:00 and 17:00. You book everything using this app.

You won’t have to pay hospital fees for any digital visits.

info1.title: General practitioner
info1.body: For (video or chat) medical examinations and advice if you’re feeling unwell or are concerned about your health.

info2.title: Psychologist
info2.body: For counselling during the acute phase, as well as an assessment as to whether you need further support.

info3.title: Physiotherapist
info3.body: For injury assessments and rehabilitation advice about problems with your back, neck, muscles or joints.

info4.title: Personal trainer
info4.body: To help you get started with your rehabilitation exercises or further develop them through treatment plans, motivational counselling and follow-ups.

info5.title: Health coach
info5.body: Support and advice about your lifestyle, diet and sleep that gives you the opportunity to create good habits and a lasting change of lifestyle.
